headline: Assessing AES (NYSE:AES) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: What AES (AES) investors might focus on now AES (AES) has drawn attention after recent share price moves, with the stock showing positive returns over the past week, month, past 3 months and year, alongside modest annual revenue and net income growth.
